"\"A.I.S. v2.0\" Tutorial":
"In this battle against [Magatsu], you will board the
「A.I.S. v2.0」 variant.

The 「A.I.S. v2.0」 has no ride time limit and is equipped with
special skills unique to this battle
that are preloaded on your subpalette."

"Now to explain the actual skills of the 「A.I.S. v2.0」.

①Weak Buster
fires a weak bullet that
dramatically lowers defenses.

②Over Boost
engages maximum thrusters
for an emergency altitudinal evasion

③Area Heal
scatters recovery photons,
healing units within a wide radius.

Additionally, all attacks now have
longer effective ranges."

"If your 「A.I.S. v2.0」 is destroyed,
you will be revived from the mission starting point.

※NOTE: This process costs valuable time,
so avoid incapacitation at all costs."

"アクションパレットのタイプを
3ボタンタイプに設定している場合、
アクション3に対応したボタンに
下記の操作が設定されます。

●表パレット・裏パレット共通
\u3000オーバーブースト"
